metadata.title: CVE-2021-46236 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability exists in GPAC v1.1.0 via the function gf_sg_vrml_field_pointer_del () at scenegraph/vrml_tools.c. This vulnerability can lead to a Denial of Service (DoS).

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
